Package com.brycethuilot.auto_mailer

Class Letter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brycethuilot.auto_mailer.Letter
  • public class Letter
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a PDF that is to be sent as a physical letter to the insured in case no email is present on QQ for an insured Can also open printer dialog to print and send, with the necessary PDF pages
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Bryce Thuilot
